name: SND-L6083R
description: H.264, MJPEG dual codec, Multiple streaming

members.name: LDC (Lens Distortion Correction)
members.details: Off / On (5 levels with min / max)

members.name: Alarm Triggers
members.details: Motion detection, Tampering detection, SD card error, NAS error

members.name: Alarm Events
members.details: File upload via FTP and E-mail, Local storage recording at event, Notification via E-mail

members.name: Max. Framerate
members.details:
H.264 : Max. 30fps at all resolutions
MJPEG : Max. 1fps at 1920 x 1080, 1280 x 960, 1280 x 720, 1024 x 768, Max. 15fps at other resolution

members.name: Video Quality Adjustment
members.details: H.264 : Target bitrate level control, MJPEG : Quality level control

members.name: Bitrate Control Method
members.details: H.264 : CBR or VBR, MJPEG : VBR

members.name: Audio Compression Format
members.details:
G.711 u-law / G.726 selectable
G.726 (ADPCM) 8KHz, G.711 8KHz, G.726 : 16Kbps, 24Kbps, 32Kbps, 40Kbps

members.name: Protocol
members.details: TCP/IP, UDP/IP, RTP(UDP), RTP(TCP), RTCP, RTSP, NTP, HTTP, HTTPS, SSL, DHCP, PPPoE, FTP, SMTP, ICMP, IGMP, SNMPv1/v2c/v3(MIB-2), ARP, DNS, DDNS, QoS, PIM-SM, UPnP, Bonjour

members.name: Security
members.details: HTTPS(SSL) login authentication, Digest login authentication, IP address filtering, User access log, 802.1x authentication

members.name: Edge Storage
members.details:
micro SD/SDHC max. 32G, NAS
- Motion images recorded in the SD memory card can be downloaded
- Manual recording at local PC

members.name: Application Programming Interface
members.details: ONVIF Profile S, G, SUNAPI (HTTP API)

members.name: Webpage Language
members.details: English, French, German, Spanish, Italian, Chinese, Korean, Russian, Japanese, Swedish, Danish, Portuguese, Turkish, Polish, Czech, Rumanian, Serbian, Dutch, Croatian, Hungarian, Greek, Norwegian, Finnish

members.name: Web Viewer
members.details:
Supported OS : Windows XP / VISTA / 7 / 8 / 8.1, MAC OS X 10.7 ~ 10.10
Supported Browser :
Microsoft Internet Explorer (Ver. 8 ~ 11),
Mozilla Firefox (Ver. 9 ~ 35),
Google Chrome (Ver. 15 ~ 40),
Apple Safari (Ver. 8.0.2(Mac OS X 10.10), 7.0.6(Mac OS X 10.9), 6.0.2 (Mac OS X 10.8, 10.7 only), 5.1.7)
